code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function MathChallenge(_ref){let{onComplete}=_ref;const[answer,setAnswer]=useState('');const[problem]=useState(()=>{const num1=Math.floor(Math.random()*50)+50;const num2=Math.floor(Math.random()*50)+50;return{num1,num2,solution:num1*num2};});const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(parseInt(answer)===problem.solution){onComplete();}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"challenge",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Math Challenge"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Solve this multiplication problem:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"problem",children:[problem.num1," \xD7 ",problem.num2," = ?"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",value:answer,onChange:e=>setAnswer(e.target.value),placeholder:"Enter your answer"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Check"})]})]});}export default MathChallenge;
